Uses of Class
org.apache.fop.layoutmgr.PageProvider

Packages that use PageProvider
org.apache.fop.layoutmgr FOP's layout engine. 
 

Uses of PageProvider in org.apache.fop.layoutmgr
 

Methods in org.apache.fop.layoutmgr that return PageProvider
protected  PageProvider AbstractBreaker.getPageProvider()
          Returns the PageProvider if any.
protected  PageProvider PageBreaker.getPageProvider()
          Returns the PageProvider if any. PageBreaker overrides this method because each page may have a different available BPD which needs to be accessible to the breaking algorithm.
 PageProvider PageSequenceLayoutManager.getPageProvider()
